settings.title: Preferences
settings.containsTextTooltip: E.g. 'google.com' means all pages that url contains 'google.com' like https://www.google.com, https://www.google.com/abc, https://xyz.google.com

deleteConfirmDialog.title: Delete
deleteConfirmDialog.deleteCurrentTooltip: Delete this page only will not effect other pages with similar url
deleteConfirmDialog.deleteAllPagesMatchedCondition: Delete all pages that url contains
deleteConfirmDialog.deleteAllPagesMatchedConditionTooltip: E.g. Delete all pages that url contains 'google.com' means page's url like https://www.google.com, https://www.google.com/abc, https://xyz.google.com will be deleted
deleteConfirmDialog.deleteAndIgnoreAllPagesMatchedCondition: Delete and ignore all pages that url contains
deleteConfirmDialog.deleteAndIgnoreAllPagesMatchedConditionT: E.g. Delete and ignore all pages that url contains 'google.com' means page's url like https://www.google.com, https://www.google.com/abc, https://xyz.google.com will be deleted will be deleted and ignored. Ignore means the page will not be saved in the future

autoExtractedContent.title: Auto Extracted Content
autoExtractedContent.tooltip: Content and screenshot are auto extracted from the page by browser extension
